data.message: I hate you forcing me to use "messenger" it's annoying. Major dislike

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Allison. We're constantly working on the Messenger experience. We hope you'll give it a try and tell us what you think: http://on.fb.me/1uGBwMk -Hailey
Allison i was angry with them to forcing me to use "messenger" but with the passing of time i feel the "messenger" is a best App for messaging  .So' try it and then decide. :)
I did. The faces popping up even when off FB really irritated me. Tried it a week & deleted. Hate it. I use Facebook for desktop for Android instead to message the old way.
Never sync facebook with your phone
They also post everyone's birthday on My google calendar. I have it unsynced!!
I love the birthday post and I love messenger 😊
ce pour allison lansberry je sui desolé

Allison they aren't forcing you to do anything!! You do not have to use "messenger". You can use it and be able to get your messages when your people post them or not use it and have to wait til you get home and get them on your desktop or laptop.
Allison how do you unsync those birthdays??? Annnnnoying!
They need to put messenger back in the fb app as an option with limited features from the app. I will never get the messenger app ever. It almost makes me want to delete everything all together.
I hate messenger! Facebook sucks so badly for "forcing" that
